lena_intro_meet.text: You look like someone who's seen ghosts. Out here, they tend to follow you.

lena_about_harlan.text: Harlan Voss? Yeah, I knew him. Ranger with a busted heart. Never stopped looking for his kid.

lena_about_jax.text: Jax was a good kid. Too smart for his own good. Vault-Tec sniffed that out quick.

lena_warning_vault77.text: Vault 77 isn't a place you walk into. It's a place you survive walking out of.

lena_reacts_overseer_voice.text: That voice... where the hell is it coming from? Sounds scared. Sounds young.

lena_realization_jax_ai.text: Wait. No. No way. That voice... that's Jax. They put him in the damn machine.

lena_anger_vaulttec.text: Vault-Tec didn't just ruin lives. They carved people up and called it progress.

lena_seeing_body.text: Oh god... that's him. That's Jax. What's left of him, anyway.

lena_to_overseer_soft.text: Jax... if you can hear me... you're not alone. Not anymore.

lena_to_overseer_firm.text: Listen to me. You don't get to run from this. Not now. Not after everything.

lena_finalA_peace.text: He deserved rest. You did right by him. Both of him.

lena_finalB_wander.text: Letting him go... that took guts. Sometimes love means not holding on.

lena_finalC_sync.text: He's still in there. Both parts of him. Maybe now he gets a second chance.

lena_aftermath_reflection.text: The wasteland doesn't give back what it takes. But sometimes... it gives you something new.
